com.mycompany.stockswag

Class StockSwag

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mycompany.stockswag.StockSwag

  • public class StockSwag
extends Object
    StockSwag class is a higher level abstraction of the application's functionality. The GUI uses this class to access the app's logic.
    Author:
    EliAir

    • Constructor Detail

      • StockSwag

        public StockSwag()
        Constructor for StockSwag. Initializes vital parts of the application such as StockDataLoader, StockManager, StockFactory, TickerValidator and StockAnalyzer. ArrayList tickers holds the user inputted stock ticker symbols.

    • Method Detail

      • validateTickersList

        public boolean validateTickersList()
        Validates user inputted ticker symbols with tickerValidator.
        Returns:
        boolean indicating whether tickers are valid or not

      • downloadStocks

        public void downloadStocks()
        Downoad latest stockdata corresponding the user inputted ticker symbols. Calls StockDataLoader to download and parse the stocks and passes them to StockFactory that creates Stock objects.

      • downloadHistoricalData

        public void downloadHistoricalData()
        Download historical data of all stocks in stockManager. Calls StockDataLoader to download and parse the historical data of the stocks and ads them to the corresponding stocks.

      • downloadIndexData

        public void downloadIndexData()
        Download S&P500 index, parse it and give to Index object.

      • loadStocksFromFile

        public void loadStocksFromFile(File file)
        Load latest stock data from the given CSV file. Calls StockDataLoader to parse the stockdata and then passes it on to stockFactory.

      • loadHistoricalDataFromFiles

        public void loadHistoricalDataFromFiles(File[] files)
        Load historical stock data from the given CSV file. Adds the historical data to the corresponding stock.

      • clearStocks

        public void clearStocks()
        Clears StockManager's stocklist and tickers in StockSwag. Important when loading new stocks to not have the old ones in the system.

      • analyzeAndPrintStocks

        public void analyzeAndPrintStocks()
        Prints all stocks in StockManager to command line. Useful for debugging and for command line UI

      • getStocks

        public List<Stock> getStocks()
        Gets all stocks currently loaded in StockManager.
        Returns:
        stocks A list of stocks

      • getStockAnalyzer

        public StockAnalyzer getStockAnalyzer()

      • addTicker

        public void addTicker(String ticker)

      • calculateDailyReturns

        public void calculateDailyReturns()
        Calculate daily returns for all stocks in StockManager.

      • calculateERs

        public void calculateERs()
        Calculate Expected Returns for all stocks in StockManager.
